book.isabelle_journal.front.title: Isabelle
book.isabelle_journal.page6.paragraph2: I hired an adventurer, ${target.name}, today, to help with the... <style color='hint'>pest problem</style>.
${capitalizeFirstLetter(target.pronoun.subject)} will be leaving port in a few days.
I look forward to meeting ${target.pronoun.object}... he he he.
